Package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.smtp.handler

Interface MailFromState

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SMTPConnection
    public interface MailFromState
    Operations for responding to MAIL FROM.

    This interface is provided to MailFromHandler.mailFrom(org.bluezoo.gumdrop.mime.rfc5322.EmailAddress, boolean, org.bluezoo.gumdrop.smtp.DeliveryRequirements, org.bluezoo.gumdrop.smtp.handler.MailFromState) and allows the handler to accept or reject the sender address.

    Accepting transitions to the recipient state where RCPT TO commands are expected. Various rejection methods are available with appropriate SMTP response codes for different scenarios.

    Author:
    Chris Burdess
    See Also:
    MailFromHandler.mailFrom(org.bluezoo.gumdrop.mime.rfc5322.EmailAddress, boolean, org.bluezoo.gumdrop.smtp.DeliveryRequirements, org.bluezoo.gumdrop.smtp.handler.MailFromState), RecipientHandler

      • rejectSenderGreylist

        void rejectSenderGreylist​(MailFromHandler handler)
        Temporarily rejects - greylisting (450 response).

        Used to implement greylisting. The client should retry later.

        Parameters:
        handler - receives retry
